; } interface Checker { colour: string; x: number; y: number; has_promoted: boolean; } export function Board() { const [board, setBoard] = useState([ [ null, { colour: "Black", x: 1, y: 0, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 3, y: 0, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 5, y: 0, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 7, y: 0, has_promoted: false }, ], [ { colour: "Black", x: 0, y: 1, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 2, y: 1, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 4, y: 1, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 6, y: 1, has_promoted: false }, null, ], [ null, { colour: "Black", x: 1, y: 2, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 3, y: 2, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 5, y: 2, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Black", x: 7, y: 2, has_promoted: false }, ], [null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null], [null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null], [ { colour: "Red", x: 0, y: 5, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 2, y: 5, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 4, y: 5, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 6, y: 5, has_promoted: false }, null, ], [ null, { colour: "Red", x: 1, y: 6, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 3, y: 6, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 5, y: 6, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 7, y: 6, has_promoted: false }, ], [ { colour: "Red", x: 0, y: 7, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 2, y: 7, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 4, y: 7, has_promoted: false }, null, { colour: "Red", x: 6, y: 7, has_promoted: false }, null, ], ]); const [displayBoard, setDisplayBoard] = useState(makeDisplayBoard()); function makeDisplayBoard() { let temp_board: (string | null)[][] = []; for (let i = 0; i < 8; i++) { let temp: (string | null)[] = []; for (let j = 0; j < 8; j++) { if (!board[i][j]) temp.push(null); else { if (board[i][j]!.colour === "Red") { if (board[i][j]!.has_promoted) temp.push("R"); else temp.push("r"); } else { if (board[i][j]!.has_promoted) temp.push("B"); else temp.push("b"); } } } temp_board.push(temp); } return temp_board; } console.log(displayBoard); return (
